name: Mister E. Lixir's One Stop Medicine Shop
name_original: Mister E. Lixir's One Stop Medicine Shop
description:
Play as the daggum best snake oil salesman the Wild West has ever seen! Mix potions  to create elixirs for the endless demand of ever-thirsty customers! Mess up an order one too many times and its 'shudders' for your medicine shop!

Programming: Gilfradus / Art: mspetkat

music by: Jason Shaw / sound effects from: www.freesound.org
